dcterms:creator: Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Iain Murray
dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits, commonly used for training various image processing systems. The MNIST dataset consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of 28x28 pixel grayscale images of digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: Ruslan Salakhutdinov
Iain Murray
dcterms:description: A dataset containing images of characters from various alphabets, used for training machine learning models in character recognition tasks. The Omniglot dataset consists of 1,623 different characters, each represented by 20 different examples.
dcterms:title: Omniglot
